ack.p: We would like to thank all the participants, study PI, trial clinicians, research nurses, Imperial Clinical Trial Unit staff and other site staff who have been responsible for setting up, recruiting participants and collecting the data for the IP2-ATLANTA trial. Further, we are grateful for the ongoing support of the Trial Management Group and our trial patient representative. Finally, we would like to thank the trial oversight provided by ICTU and our trial funder the Wellcome Trust.
